data.lyric:
[ti:Nobody]
[ar:Dylan Scott]
[al:Nobody]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Nobody - Dylan Scott
[00:09.21]Baby I see them boys
[00:12.14]They always lookin' at you
[00:15.15]But I ain't causin' a scene
[00:17.86]'Cause girl I'm the
[00:18.76]One that's with you
[00:20.84]They can shoot you a wink
[00:22.29]They can buy you a drink
[00:24.37]Try to steal your attention
[00:26.63]They can talk a big talk
[00:28.25]They can walk a big walk
[00:29.62]But I know you ain't
[00:31.00]Going home with 'em
[00:32.58]Girl nobody nobody
[00:34.71]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[00:38.58]Yeah nobody nobody
[00:40.47]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[00:45.56]I'mma love you till the good
[00:46.98]Lord comes back for me and you
[00:50.49]Yeah nobody nobody
[00:52.50]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[00:56.93]I know how you like your coffee
[00:59.80]And how hot you like your bath
[01:02.73]I know what makes you angry
[01:06.41]And what makes you laugh
[01:08.63]I know the taste of your lips
[01:10.17]Every inch of your skin
[01:11.88]The little things that turn you on
[01:14.60]I know that look in your eyes
[01:16.15]When they look back at mine
[01:17.64]Saying baby take me home
[01:20.49]Girl nobody nobody
[01:22.56]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[01:26.58]Yeah nobody nobody
[01:28.48]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[01:33.47]I'mma love you till the good
[01:34.83]Lord comes back for me and you
[01:38.75]Yeah nobody nobody
[01:40.54]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[01:44.60]I'm going to love you love you
[01:48.35]The only way that I know
[01:50.51]I'm going to love you love you
[01:54.10]Like there's no tomorrow
[01:56.59]Yeah nobody nobody
[01:58.43]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[02:02.52]Girl nobody nobody
[02:04.42]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[02:08.51]Yeah nobody nobody
[02:10.48]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[02:14.27]Like I do
[02:15.62]I'mma love you till the good
[02:17.11]Lord comes back for me and you
[02:20.64]Girl nobody nobody
[02:22.36]Nobody gonna love you like I do
[02:26.54]Yeah nobody nobody
[02:28.45]Nobody gonna love you like I do
data.trans:
[ti:Nobody]
[ar:Dylan Scott]
[al:Nobody]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:09.21]宝贝 我看见那些男孩
[00:12.14]他们总是目不转睛地看着你
[00:15.15]但是我不会当众惹事
[00:17.86]因为 亲爱的
[00:18.76]我是那个与你在一起的人
[00:20.84]他们可以向你抛媚眼
[00:22.29]他们可以请你喝一杯
[00:24.37]试图转移你的注意力
[00:26.63]他们可以夸夸其谈
[00:28.25]他们可以长途跋涉
[00:29.62]但是我知道
[00:31.00]你不会跟他们一起回家
[00:32.58]女孩 这世上没有人
[00:34.71]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[00:38.58]这世上没有人
[00:40.47]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[00:45.56]我会永远爱你
[00:46.98]直到仁慈的上帝来到我们身边
[00:50.49]这世上没有人
[00:52.50]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[00:56.93]我知道你有多喜欢咖啡
[00:59.80]我知道你喜欢温暖的热水澡
[01:02.73]我知道什么会让你生气
[01:06.41]我知道什么能够让你微笑
[01:08.63]我知道你双唇的味道
[01:10.17]我了解你的每一寸肌肤
[01:11.88]我知道让你开心的琐碎小事
[01:14.60]当你回头望着我的双眼时
[01:16.15]我明白你的眼神
[01:17.64]仿佛在说 宝贝 带我回家吧
[01:20.49]女孩 这世上没有人
[01:22.56]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[01:26.58]这世上没有人
[01:28.48]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[01:33.47]我会永远爱你
[01:34.83]直到仁慈的上帝来到我们身边
[01:38.75]这世上没有人
[01:40.54]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[01:44.60]我会好好爱你
[01:48.35]这是我知道的唯一办法
[01:50.51]我会好好爱你
[01:54.10]仿佛明天就是世界末日一般
[01:56.59]这世上没有人
[01:58.43]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[02:02.52]女孩 这世上没有人
[02:04.42]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[02:08.51]这世上没有人
[02:10.48]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[02:14.27]像我一样
[02:15.62]我会永远爱你
[02:17.11]直到仁慈的上帝来到我们身边
[02:20.64]女孩 这世上没有人
[02:22.36]没有人能够像我一样爱你
[02:26.54]这世上没有人
[02:28.45]没有人能够像我一样爱你
